Whilst randomly walking around Gracia, we came across this cute little gem and saw the fresh pasta being made behind the counter.  Having not had pasta in Europe yet (I don't know how it was possible going on 5+ days in Paris and Barcelona), we decided to give it a try.  I'm glad we did.  It's the same concept as a Chipotle in the United States, but with Italian.  You pick a pasta, a sauce, and the fixin's.  It was the perfect place for a lunch/mid-afternoon lite meal with a glass of wine.  It was also very inexpensive.
